headline: Edison International's Quarterly Earnings Preview: What You Need to Know
summary: Edison International is gearing up to release its third-quarter results later this month, and analysts are expecting a double-digit decline in the company’s bottom-line figure.

headline: Assessing Edison International After California’s $18B Wildfire Fund Announcement
summary: If you’re eyeing Edison International and debating whether to pick up shares, you’re definitely not alone. This isn’t just another utility stock quietly treading water. In just the past week, shares jumped 6.9%, shaking off some of the rough patches from earlier this year. Put that in context, though—Edison International’s year-to-date and one-year returns are down 29.1%, making the recent uptick particularly interesting for bargain hunters wondering if the tides are changing. What’s behind...
